release_notes: Enhanced workspace management with multi-workspace support and improved import/export capabilities

changes: Completely revamped workspace management system for better organization
Implemented multi-workspace support with seamless switching between workspaces
Created dedicated WorkspaceManager class for centralized workspace handling
Added WorkspaceToolbar with intuitive UI for workspace operations
Implemented workspace import/export functionality with plugin data preservation
Enhanced device loading to work regardless of plugin availability
Added workspace database manager for efficient data storage
Improved workspace autosave with better reliability and performance
Added support for device groups in workspace import/export
Transformed traditional menubar into modern Office-style ribbon toolbar
Implemented grouped toolbar buttons for better organization
Fixed button scaling issues to ensure text remains readable at all window sizes
Improved tab design with closer spacing and modern styling
Added Home/View/Tools/Plugins/Help tabs for better categorization
Enhanced UI documentation to explain the new ribbon interface
Ensured consistent button sizing with minimum dimensions
Fixed toolbar overflow issues with improved layout management
Redesigned toolbar system with Microsoft Office-style tab interface
Added comprehensive device selection debugging in device_table.py
Improved bottom panel resizing with minimal height constraints
Enhanced plugin content handling within the bottom panel
Updated API documentation for toolbar integration
Fixed UI issues when using 'Tools' menu and hovering
Improved plugin integration with toolbar tabs
Made toolbar documentation more comprehensive for plugin developers
Solved resizing issues with embedded content in the bottom panel
Reorganized project structure for better maintainability
Moved utility scripts to utils/ directory
Moved batch files and setup scripts to scripts/ directory
Moved version_manager.py to core/ directory
Moved DEBUG.md to docs/ folder
Updated file paths and import references to reflect new structure
Added start.py launcher with improved error handling
Updated launch.bat to use new project structure
Removed workspace functionality from the program
Replaced workspace system with direct database storage for devices
Implemented DeviceDatabaseManager for centralized device data management
Cleaned up all workspace references from UI components
Simplified program architecture by removing workspace dependencies
Improved memory usage by eliminating workspace storage
Updated documentation to reflect database-centric approach
Fixed workspace loading to properly restore device information from database
Enhanced DefaultWorkspaceManager to load all device details when opening workspaces
Improved workspace loading to apply saved table settings when opening workspaces
Enhanced workspace file naming using descriptive names for better organization
Added workspace deletion capability with confirmation dialog
Added quick save button to workspace toolbar for faster access
Implemented auto-save functionality with configurable timer
Improved workspace management UI with more intuitive controls
Enhanced DefaultWorkspaceManager with proper database storage for device information
Improved workspace toolbar UI with larger buttons and better visual style
Added comprehensive device storage and retrieval functionality to default workspaces
Enhanced UI elements with better spacing, font sizing, and visual feedback
Fixed workspace opening functionality in DefaultWorkspaceManager
Added proper file dialog for opening workspaces without a plugin
Enhanced DefaultWorkspaceManager with no-argument open_workspace method
Improved error handling in workspace operations
Updated DefaultWorkspaceManager to use PySide6 instead of PyQt5
Fixed Qt framework compatibility in default workspace management
Improved cross-framework compatibility in workspace handling
Enhanced consistency in Qt library usage
Redesigned workspace toolbar with dropdown menu for better space efficiency
Added consolidated Workspace Manager button with full menu of workspace operations
Improved workspace controls with integrated dropdown selector and rename capability
Enhanced UI experience with contextual workspace button showing current workspace name
Fixed workspace toolbar integration to always display in main window
Improved toolbar layout with consistent workspace management controls
Enhanced usability by making workspace toolbar available regardless of plugin status
Added WorkspaceToolbar integration to the main window for better workspace management
Enhanced workspace management with dedicated toolbar component
Improved user experience for common workspace operations
Added proper database storage for all application data
Created WorkspaceDBManager for integrated database management
Standardized the workspace data structure and database schema
Enhanced base-network-scanner to write directly to the database
Added comprehensive workspace integration with loadable/saveable workspaces
Improved plugin modularity with standardized database access
Updated documentation for database storage and workspace integration
Enhanced device management with better database persistence
Removed workspace integration code from the base-network-scanner plugin
Made base-network-scanner plugin independent of workspace functionality
Improved plugin isolation for better modularity
Enhanced device storage with in-memory scan history
Fixed error in base-network-scanner plugin's workspace_saved hook handler
Updated hook handler to properly handle workspace_id as a string instead of expecting a dictionary
Improved error handling in workspace plugin hook dispatching
Fixed race conditions and potential deadlocks in workspace auto-save functionality
Improved database connection handling with enhanced cleanup and retry mechanism
Fixed potential memory leaks by ensuring database connections are properly closed
Enhanced thread safety in concurrent database operations with improved locking strategy
Improved reliability of workspace saving during high system load
Fixed 'attempted relative import with no known parent package' error in workspace plugin
Fixed 'No module named ui.left_panel' error in base-network-scanner plugin
Enhanced workspace plugin dynamic loading with importlib for more reliable imports
Implemented dynamic module loading with importlib for better plugin compatibility
Implemented path-based import resolution for plugin modules
Enhanced module loading mechanism to support direct module execution
Improved plugin loading robustness with dynamic path handling
Fixed import paths in workspace plugin to use relative imports
Replaced absolute imports with relative imports in workspace_plugin.py
Fixed plugin loading error due to incorrect import paths in main.py
Improved plugin module resolution by using proper relative imports
Moved workspace plugin from core plugins to standalone plugin
Fixed plugin import paths for workspace plugin
Updated workspace plugin to be independent from main window
Fixed 'No module named plugins.core.workspace' error
Fixed Workspace menu appearing when plugin is disabled
Improved main menu to only show Workspace menu when plugin is enabled
Fixed workspace saving issues when loading workspaces
Improved thread safety in workspace database operations with proper locking
Added exponential backoff for database retries to handle locked database scenarios
Implemented forced save after workspace loading to ensure data consistency
Enhanced auto-save functionality to prevent database conflicts
Fixed import error in core-workspace plugin
Improved plugin loading mechanism to support absolute imports in plugins
Enhanced plugin path management for better module resolution
Fixed 'attempted relative import with no known parent package' error
Refactored workspace management into a core plugin
Added workspace startup dialog for improved workspace selection
Enhanced workspace toolbar with recent workspaces menu
Improved workspace management with plugin-based architecture
Added comprehensive API for other plugins to interact with workspaces
Enhanced device editing with custom fields support
Improved manual device addition with custom field management
Added ability to add, edit, and delete custom fields for devices
Updated device table with better usability for custom field management
Enhanced device properties dialog with improved layout and usability
Added 'Edit Device Properties' option to device table context menu
Improved device management with ability to edit existing device information
Enhanced manual device addition to be available from any area of the device table
Updated device management documentation with comprehensive editing guidelines
Added standardized device data structure documentation for plugin developers
Added ability to manually add devices through right-click context menu in device table
Enhanced device management with user-friendly dialog for manual device entry
Added support for custom device metadata when adding devices manually
Improved device table context menu to be context-aware (empty area vs device selection)
Fixed device discovery display issue in network scanner plugin
Enhanced device registration system with multiple fallback paths
Improved error handling and debugging for device integration
Added comprehensive documentation on device discovery for plugin developers
Added robust error diagnostics for plugin device registration
Fixed device discovery and display in base-network-scanner plugin
Fixed datetime comparison error in scan history panel
Improved device detection reliability during network scans
Enhanced error handling when adding devices to the device table
Added multiple fallback methods for device registration
Created comprehensive UI framework documentation for plugin developers
Added detailed examples for PySide6 usage in plugins
Documented thread safety best practices for UI components
Updated plugin documentation to clarify PySide6 migration status
Fixed compatibility issues with latest Python packages
Resolved plugin loading errors on Windows systems
Improved performance of network scanning module
Enhanced UI responsiveness during heavy operations
Migrated from PyQt5 to PySide6 for core application
Added PySide6 support for all native plugins
Maintained PyQt5 compatibility layer for legacy plugins
Updated UI framework to use PySide6 styling
Improved thread handling for background operations
Resolved multiple UI freezing issues
Fixed inconsistent behavior in plugin registration
Fixed compatibility issue with the migration from PyQt5 to PySide6
Added 'is_scanning' property to NetworkScanner class to properly expose scan status
Improved thread safety with proper signal handling between UI components
Enhanced Network Scanner plugin UI with main panel implementation
Main panel integration with NetworkScanner scan engine
Split panel UI layout for network map, device details, and scan results
Control panel with interface selection, IP range, and scan type options
Status bar with scan progress indicators and device count
Improved thread safety in base-network-scanner plugin with proper thread checking
Enhanced error handling in scan operations within base-network-scanner plugin
Added enhanced network topology visualization with device relationship mapping
Improved network scanning engine with multi-threaded performance optimizations
Updated plugin management interface for better user experience
Fixed multiple UI responsiveness issues during active network scans
Fixed plugin UI components threading issues in base-network-scanner
Implemented thread-safe pattern for creating plugin UI components
Improved plugin documentation with thread-safety examples
Enhanced plugin panel registration to properly handle thread boundaries
Fixed plugin panels appearing outside main window
Improved thread safety for panel registration
Updated splash screen to use version from manifest.json
Added plugin UI integration documentation for proper threading
Fixed version manifest compatibility with main window
Added missing version_string and min_python_version fields to version manifest
Improved application startup reliability
Added base-network-scanner plugin for network device discovery
Enhanced device management capabilities
Improved scan history tracking and visualization
Improved plugin dependency management - plugins now use the main app's virtual environment
Optimized plugin loading with reduced memory footprint
Added dynamic installation/uninstallation of plugin requirements
Added dedicated documentation_requirements.md for plugin developers
Improved API documentation template for better plugin interoperability
Reorganized documentation structure for clarity
Added formal API.md documentation requirement for plugins
Enhanced plugin manifest documentation standards
Provided standardized API documentation format for better interoperability
Enhanced plugin documentation requirements
Added API documentation format specifications
Improved plugin development guidelines
Added restart notification dialog when enabling or disabling plugins
Initial release
Implemented modular plugin architecture
Added core networking functionality
Basic UI framework established
Added multi-device selection support in device table
Added device groups functionality for organizing devices
Updated plugin API to support multi-device operations
Improved context menu to support operations on multiple selected devices
Fixed bug with menu mouse grab on Windows systems

changes.description: Changed storage location from @data to data directory for consistency
changes.details: All data storage now uses the 'data' directory instead of '@data'. Documentation updated to reflect this change. Plugin developers should update their code to use the correct path.

changes.description: Changed storage location from @data to data directory for consistency
changes.details: All data storage now uses the 'data' directory instead of '@data'. Documentation updated to reflect this change. Plugin developers should update their code to use the correct path.
